name: SL Benfica Fantasy Manager 18
description:
SL BENFICA FANTASY MANAGER 2018 - BE THE BOSS: the new edition of the MOST ADDICTING FOOTBALL mobile manager has arrived! Lead the team of your dreams and defeat thousands of users. It’s FREE and designed for Iphone and Ipad. Discover all of this year's updates.

A TOTALLY ADDICTIVE MANAGER GAME

Your team. Your SLB. Buy new players, coach them, take on other fans and prove your managerial abilities!

GET THE BEST PLAYERS

Just like real life, you need to beat off competition from other managers to sign the best players. You’ll need to offer a higher transfer fee to buy them, start coaching them, improve their skills and make your SLB starting 11 even better. Work hard and take your team to the top.

REAL-LIFE ATTRIBUTES FOR PLAYERS

Fantasy Manager is the only game in which your players’ performances are based on their real-life performances on the pitch. That means the game gets more varied and exciting every week. Can you identify the top stars of the future? Could you predict now who’ll experience a dip in form soon?

HOW WELL DO YOU KNOW FOOTBALL? ARE YOU READY TO TAKE ON THE BEST OF THE BEST?

You’ll be able to prove how good your knowledge of football is in the league. That’s the most important competition in SLB Fantasy Manager. You’ll have to go full throttle to get promotion to the top league and win exclusive prizes.

MAKE YOUR TEAM UNBEATABLE

Get the best strikers and take your opponents’ defence apart. It’s your decision: play one-on-one games or qualify for new tournaments. Show what you can do!

PLAY AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS AND MANAGERS OF OTHER CLUBS

Your friends want to play with you and help you to improve your game, but they still want to beat you of course! SLB Fantasy Managers team up to take on managers of other clubs like Schalke 04, Real Madrid or Juventus.

NEW: In the latest version, you can not only play with your friends, but also chat with them via the integrated messenger.

Download SLB FANTASY MANAGER for free and take the reigns at your favourite club.

(not compatible with iOS <8)
